tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Awesome math prof, and just one of the best profs I have had at this university. Makes lecture actually interesting and his sense of humor is on point. He has a monotone voice, but that makes his delivery of sarcastic jokes so much better so you don\'t really get tired or bored of it. Don\'t skip class, come in late, or have your phone go off.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Finite is pretty DIY, but Prof. Kirk is very good at demonstrating how to work through example problems. He sounds just like Ray Romano, though, so be ready.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Class is challenging, but Kirk does his best to help students. Answers questions clearly when asked. He has a monotone type voice, which can be annoying, but he tries to crack jokes every now and then to lighten the mood. Very nice guy. If you\'re taking Finite I recommend Kirk.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He\'s a very laid back teacher, and spells things out very matter-of-factly. He\'s a nice guy but the course is confusing if math is not your strong suit going into it. Going to office hours/Teter help is always a good idea!

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Kirk is a very nice guy and helpful teacher. I went to his office hours a lot and studied pretty hard to get a B in the class. Finite is a tough subject, but hes a good prof to get for it.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He helps his students understand what is needed for exams. He also is funny most of the time because he jumps around with his examples. He also can be very understanding with students. If you have to take finite take him!

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: If you are choosing between professors for the dreaded finite, choose Kirk. He does a great job making sure that his students know only what they need for the test. Other teachers do ridiculous amounts of webwork problems, but Kirk only does what is necessary to learn the material.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Professor Kirk is one of my favorite professors by far. He\'s very laid back and makes the classroom comfortable. Only thing he hates is people who walk in late and cell phones. He\'s also only so-so in office hours, but he makes himself very approachable so asking questions in class is no big deal.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He is very nice and fun,I really enjoyed taking his class this semester.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He\'s a good teacher and a nice guy. I\'d take more classes taught by him I given the opportunity.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: If you want an easy A or someone who holds your hand through everything, find a different professor. If you want someone who understands exactly what he is doing, challenges you constantly, and makes you a better mathematician, sign up.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He is a very cool professor. Didnt learn a whole lot from lecture but the book really helps.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: not helpful, sounds like the "Dry Eyes" guy, hard grader, do not take his finite course.
